productIds.title: Product IDs
productIds.description: An array of Homedepot Product IDs. You can provide multiple Product IDs or just one.

zipCodes.title: Zip-codes
zipCodes.description: An array of US Zip codes. You can provide multiple Zipcodes IDs or just one.

storeIds.title: Store IDs
storeIds.description: An array of Homedepot Store IDs. You can provide multiple Store IDs or just one.
